1.content: Before we get started who are you playing as? (Just pick one of the options below)
1.title: Welcome to school

choices: Haru The female bunny girl that likes you
Louis The male deer that allwase gets in you way of romance
Juno The female wolf that has a crush on you
11.content: ( you chose Legoshi the male wolf and the main character of beastars) ( https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/beas... ) you wake up after a long and good sleep in the boys dorm room. You stretch out on the bed. “Man that was a good nights sleep” you then go out into the hallway and begin walking to your first class of the day. You then axedentally bump into someone and hit your head hard on the wall. You are nocked out. When you wake up you hear someone talking. It’s? Who was talking?
11.title: Legoshi The wolf

choices: A body part of juno the wolf
Food that was in a wrapper
113.content: You then realize the person who is talking is juno ( https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/beas... ) she has alwase had a crush on you. You then realize you can’t move. You realize that you have become a inanimate object. You see something blocking your view. When the thing blocking your view is removed. you see you are?
113.title: Juno The female wolf that has a crush on you

1131.content: You realize you have become a body part of juno the wolf and she is at the girls dorm. By the way your moving you realize you are?
1131.title: A body part of juno the wolf

info.brief_description: Your a character in the anime beastars and you get turned into a inanimate object
info.description: Hope you like this story guys
